channel.title: Help with something little advanced :) after this can i put my serv online :)
channel.description:
a little advanced but i need a little bit help here :)
1. how to add like a new points off something that u kill... idk like dragons and then u get dragon points u can buy dragon stuff with? 2. how to add that staff also loose items on death but certain items are being deleted? so noone can get admin plate and armour :) 3. how to make the staff armour untradeable? 4. how can i make donator sign show up for donators?
please help me and do NOT flame :I

item.title: Help with something little advanced :) after this can i put my serv online :)
item.dc:creator: @ShadowDD ShadowDD
item.description:
@ShadowDD wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:314653"]1. Ints.
2. Check the void/method that deals with death, add an if statement for their rights variable.
3. Check the void/method that deals with trading, add an if statement for the item.
4. Client hardcoding.

I don’t feel like giving more help because I’m so hated.[/quote]

Pretty much what he said is all I know about that stuff =\

Read full topic
item.source: Help with something little advanced :) after this can i put my serv online :)

item.title: Help with something little advanced :) after this can i put my serv online :)
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

You’re going to have to go into the code that processes trades and if an id of a staff item is in there, deny the trade.

Now get that shit out of your signature.

Read full topic
